DOC.brief_summary: The rationale study investigate absorption , metabolism excretion [ 14C ] PF 02341066 characterize plasma , fecal urinary radioactivity , identify metabolite , possible , [ 14C ] PF 02341066 human .
DOC.brief_title: Radiolabeled 14CPF-02341066 Study To Investigate The Absorption , Metabolism And Excretion In Healthy Male Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy male subject age 18 55 year , inclusive ( Healthy define clinically relevant abnormality identify detailed medical history , full physical examination , include blood pressure pulse rate measurement , 12 lead ECG clinical laboratory test ) . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 17.5 30.5 kg/m^2 ; total body weight > 50 kg ( 110 lb ) . Evidence history clinically significant hematological , renal , endocrine , pulmonary , gastrointestinal , cardiovascular , hepatic , psychiatric , neurologic , allergic disease ( include drug allergy , exclude untreated , asymptomatic , seasonal allergy time dose ) . Any condition possibly affect drug absorption ( eg , gastrectomy ) . A positive urine drug screen .
